Weapons.proficiency: Simple Weapons, Hand Crossbows, Longswords, Rapiers, Shortswords

Tools.proficiency: Thieves' Tools, Three-Dragon Ante Set, Disguise Kit, Poisoner Kit

Marks.value: Sideburns; Mssing tip of pinky on left hand; Small slanted scar on chin running from left to right

Trait1.value: I don't pay attention to the risks in a situation. Never tell me the odds.

Trait2.value: There's nothing I like more than a good mystery.

Ideal.value: Freedom: Chains are meant to be broken, as are those who would forge them. (Chaotic)

Bond.value: Someone I love died because of a mistake I made. That will never happen again.

Flaw.value: I'm a sucker for a pretty face.

Background.value: Criminal Contact: Network of trustworthy contacts. Can use them to send and receive messages quickly over great distances.

Notes.value: Last big job went wrong. Escaped from prison. Injured, rest of group assumed dead. Am still wanted.

Item.name: Bag of Gems
Item.note: A small bag containing many fine gems worth 170gp.

Item.name: Ball Bearings (bag of 1,000)
Item.note: As an action, you can spill these tiny metal balls from their pouch to cover a level, square area that is 10 feet on a side. Moving across the covered area must succeed on a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw or fall prone. Moving through the area at half speed doesn't need a save.

Item.name: Black Onxy Leather Gloves
Item.note: Fancy pair of for hidding rings on ones hand.

Item.name: Blue Cloak with Hood
Item.note: Simple cloak with usable hood.

Item.name: Candle
Item.note: For 1 hour, a candle sheds bright light in a 5-foot radius and dim light for an additional 5 feet.

Item.name: Crowbar
Item.note: Using a crowbar grants advantage to Strength checks where the crowbar's leverage can be applied.

Item.name: Cult of the Dragon Patch
Item.note: An insignia representing membership with the Dragon Cult.

Item.name: Dirty Handkerchief
Item.note: Filthy peice of cloth of unknown origins.

Item.name: Eagle Beak
Item.note: The beak of an eagle that was far too much trouble.

Item.name: Flask of Oil
Item.note: A flask or tankard can hold 1 pint of liquid.

Item.name: Fur coat
Item.note: Fur coat for keeping warm in cold climates.

Item.name: Hammer
Item.note: This one-handed hammer with an iron head is useful for pounding pitons into a wall.

Item.name: Hooded lantern
Item.note: Casts bright light in 30 foot radius, dim light for additional 30 feet. Burns 6 hours on pint of oil. Lower hood to cast dim light in 5 foot radius.

Item.name: Insperation Die (d10)
Item.note: Used to add a d10 to any d20 roll.

Item.name: Magic Stick
Item.note: A thin stick thought to be magical in some way.

Item.name: Map
Item.note: Map to an unspecified location.

Item.name: Nightcap
Item.note: A 'magic' nightcap given by an annoying bird person.

Item.name: Ogre Tusk
Item.note: Tusk of a fallen ogre.

Item.name: Piton
Item.note: When a wall doesn’t offer handholds and footholds, you can make your own. A piton is a steel spike with an eye through which you can loop a rope.

Item.name: Poisoner's Kit
Item.note: Contains chemicals and equipment to create poisons.

Item.name: Quiver
Item.note: A quiver can hold up to 20 arrows.

Item.name: Rations (1-Day)
Item.note: Rations consist of dry foods suitable for extended travel, including jerky, dried fruit, hardtack, and nuts.

Item.name: Red Cape
Item.note: A simple cape.

Item.name: Ring
Item.note: A simple gold ring.

Item.name: Rope, Hempen (50 feet)
Item.note: Rope, has 2 hit points and can be burst with a DC 17 Strength check.

Item.name: Salted Meat
Item.note: Food for one person for a meal.

Item.name: Sheet of Paper
Item.note: Say the words 'trust is earned' to get all the perks befitting a lieutenant.

Item.name: Small bead
Item.note: A small marble like bead coloured a translucent green.

Item.name: String
Item.note: A 10-foot length of string, typically found in a burglar's pack.

Item.name: Thieves Tools
Item.note: Small file, lock picks, mirror on metal handle, narrow bladed scissors, pliers.

Item.name: Three-Dragon Ante Set
Item.note: The deck consists of 70 cards (plus two reference cards).

Item.name: Tinderbox
Item.note: This small container holds flint, fire steel, and tinder (usually dry cloth soaked in light oil) used to kindle a fire. Using it to light a torch -- or anything else with abundant, exposed fuel -- takes an action. Lighting any other fire takes 1 minute.

Item.name: Trinket
Item.note: A carved crystal that faintly glows in the moonlight. (Object stolen from the noble)

Item.name: Waterskin
Item.note: A waterskin can hold 4 pints of liquid.

Ability.name: Alert
Ability.notes: +5 to initative; Cannot be surprised; enemies don't get advt on sneak attack

Ability.name: Fey Ancestry
Ability.notes: Avtg on saving throws against being charmed. Magic cannot put me to sleep

Ability.name: Expertise
Ability.notes: Double proficiency bonus in select skills (Again at level 6)

Ability.name: Thieves' Cant
Ability.notes: Takes 4 times longer to convey meaning. Target must also know Cant

Ability.name: Sneak Attack
Ability.notes: Must have advantage or target must have enemy within 5 feet

Ability.name: Cunning Action
Ability.notes: Dash, Disengage, Hide as bonus action

Ability.name: Assassinate
Ability.notes: Avtg on attack rolls against creature without combat turn; Hit against surprised creature is critical

Ability.name: Uncanny Dodge
Ability.notes: Use reaction to take half damage against an attack you can see.

Spell.name: Jump
Spell.description: Target's jump distance tripled until spell ends. Can be used once per long rest.

CampainNotes.Note: {\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\deff0\deflang1033\deflangfe1033{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset0 Microsoft Sans Serif;}{\f1\fnil\fcharset2 Symbol;}} {\colortbl ;\red128\green0\blue128;\red255\green255\blue255;\red128\green0\blue255;\red0\green255\blue255;\red0\green128\blue0;\red255\green128\blue0;} \viewkind4\uc1\pard\cf1\b\f0\fs44 Main\fs41\par \b0\f1\fs24\'b7\f0 \cf2 \fs29 We must speak to the \cf3 Dark Elves of Blinding Rock\cf2 , and their leader \cf4 Nazire\cf2 . The entrance to Blinding Rock is in the underdark to the north.\par \par \cf1\f1\fs24\'b7\f0 \cf2 \fs29 We learned of a fae artifact known as The Source that the elves Aveburry are planning to use as a weapon. We are tasked with destroying it, or preventing its use.\par \fs24\par \cf5\b\fs44 The Mines\par \b0\f1\fs24\'b7\cf2\f0 \fs29 On the way to \cf6 Damera \cf2 we stumbled across a group of miners fleeing a destroyed mine. The mine had been destroyed by giant ants and they requested our help to eliminate them. They told us to meet with their company, \cf4 Bandar\cf2 , in the \cf6 Selatan ward \cf2 in \cf6 Damera\cf2 . At this point Gilbert attacked the leader and we were forced to intervene.\par \par \cf5\b\fs44 Hunting Lodge\par \b0\f1\fs24\'b7\cf2\f0 \fs29 Discovered \fs24\par }

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\deff0\deflang1033\deflangfe1033{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset0 Microsoft Sans Serif;}{\f1\fnil\fcharset2 Symbol;}} {\colortbl ;\red128\green64\blue64;\red255\green255\blue255;\red0\green128\blue128;\red255\green128\blue64;\red128\green0\blue255;\red128\green0\blue0;} \viewkind4\uc1\pard\cf1\b\f0\fs41 Devils Dream\par \cf2\par \cf3 Mortal Syndicate\cf2\par \par \cf4 Mortal Raider\cf2\par \par \cf5 Dark Elves of Blinding Rock\cf2\par \b0\f1\fs24\'b7\f0 \fs29 Group we are trying to locate.\par \f1\fs24\'b7\f0 \fs29 The leader is a person by the name of Nazire\par \f1\fs24\'b7\f0 \fs29 Known members include: Filbin, Erwin.\par \f1\fs24\'b7\f0 \fs29 Important person named Hadryn mizzrgon\b\fs41\par \par \cf6 Boiling Fist\par \cf2\b0\f1\fs24\'b7\f0 \fs29 These are the people we now work for, and apperently they don't like Imperials.\par \f1\fs24\'b7\f0 \fs29 Led by a woman named Mondath Frume\par \f1\fs24\'b7\f0 \fs29 First in command is a dragonborn named Cynwrath\fs24\par }

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\deff0\deflang1033\deflangfe1033{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset0 Microsoft Sans Serif;}{\f1\fnil\fcharset2 Symbol;}} {\colortbl ;\red128\green128\blue128;\red255\green255\blue255;\red0\green128\blue64;\red255\green128\blue64;\red128\green0\blue128;} \viewkind4\uc1\pard\cf1\b\f0\fs41 Gray\par \cf2\b0\f1\fs24\'b7\f0 \fs29 Very large, good for frontal assault.\par \f1\fs24\'b7\f0 \fs29 Knows a person called Averus Grim with the \b\fs41\par \par \cf3 Kussandrick\par \cf2\b0\f1\fs24\'b7\f0 \fs29 Useless, cannon fodder.\par \f1\fs24\'b7\f0 \fs29 Can't ever get to D&D on time.\fs24 \b\fs41\par \par \cf4 Gilbert\par \cf2\b0\f1\fs24\'b7\f0 \fs29 Fucking crazy, never be alone with him.\par \par \cf5\b\fs41 La Fonda\cf4\par \cf2\b0\f1\fs24\'b7\f0 Monk, temp companion (for now).\par }

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\deff0\deflang1033\deflangfe1033{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset2 Symbol;}{\f1\fnil\fcharset0 Microsoft Sans Serif;}} {\colortbl ;\red255\green255\blue255;\red255\green0\blue0;} \viewkind4\uc1\pard\cf1\f0\fs24\'b7\f1 \fs29 Remember to sell the bag of gems (am almost out of gold)\par \f0\fs24\'b7\f1 \fs29 Try to get deposit back on original horse and carriage.\par \f0\fs24\'b7\f1 \fs29 Get into the vault | elevator to 4 floor, and to basement which is locked. hatch will open to basement. 2-3 guards. gromash froom\cf2\par \cf1\f0\fs24\'b7\f1 \fs29 Her and Silverpine were scheming together. Meeting point outside city near Philbin. Found letter of their discussions. Large concentration of trade routes along toung river to tower, not a lot out there so it's strange to see so many going there. There are a lot of books on the fae wilds. Gromash Froom daughter is leader of Boiling Fist, Mondath. Silverpine in the second tower, source is a fae artifact, Silver \cf2\par \cf1\f0\fs24\'b7\f1 \fs29 First tower... see meteor shower during watch. 4 cloaks with patch (cult dragon). \par \par Meet black dragonborn at camp (hunting lodge). Talos the white. Marked for death. thelo the guide\par \par lander oil bag of insence, 2 healing potion 2d4 +2\par \par Still here\par \par Alea agis cornath\par \fs24\par }
